SA01abhsubhu:617: vidūṣaṇāyāsamutthāpanāyānutpāde jñāne niṣṭhāyāṃ mahārtheṣu jñānaṃ tadvidūṣaṇajñānaṃ yāvanmahārthajñānamiti yojayitavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:627: sarvakālamaparicchinnākāratvāt citrākāravijñaptirekasyāneka ākāro vicitraśceti durvyavasthāpanādasyāḥ sūkṣmatvam /
SA01abhsubhu:628: sahabhāvavijñaptirekakālotpannāti vijñānāni kathaṃ pṛthagyathāsvaṃ viṣayaṃ paricchindantīti durvyavasthāpanātsūkṣmatvam /
SA01abhsubhu:630: vipakṣapratipakṣalaghuparivṛttivijñaptiḥ kathaṃ rāgādisamastabandhanaṃ cittaṃ tanmuhureva sakṛdvītarāgādikaṃ bhavatīti /
SA01abhsubhu:631: vāsanāvijñaptiḥ kathaṃ karmabhiḥ samudācaradbhiḥ cittaṃ vāsyate,
SA01abhsubhu:634: phaladānaṃ ca prati krameṇa vṛttilābha iti /
SA01abhsubhu:636_0: muktavijñaptiḥ kathamarhataścittaṃ paramaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ dharmatāprāptaṃ saṃsārocitasarvaprakārasāśravacaryā
SA01abhsubhu:636_1: samatikrāntamanenākāreṇa vartata iti durvyavasthāpanādasyāḥ sūkṣmatvaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:637: draṣṭādigrahaṇena draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā svādayitā spraṣṭā vijñātā cetyeṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:645: tatra rūpīti rūpaṃ tasya dharmasyātmasvabhāvastasmādasau rūpī,
SA01abhsubhu:651: na tu yathā vedanādīnāṃ pūrvikā ca nāndo samudayaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:655: deśopadeśato 'muṣyāṃ diśīti vyavadeṣṭuṃ śakyatvāt deśagocarataḥ kasmiścitpradeśe sthitasyālaṃbanībhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:657: dvayasamagocarataḥ sattvadvayasya samamālaṃ vanībhāvānna tvevamarūpiṇo yathātmānubhavaṃ paraiḥ parigrahītumaśakyatvāditi /
SA01abhsubhu:662: vyābādhanataḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ pāṇyādisaṃsparśaiḥ śokādibhiśca yathāyogaṃ rūpaṇāt bādhanādityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:666: antarmukhato rūpāvacarasya rūpasya samāpatticittatṛṣṇāsaṃbhūtatvādata evāsya manomayatvaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:676: yathā rūvitadātmato 'pīti vistareṇa rūpītyuktaṃ tathā sanidarśanatadātmato 'pi sanidarśanaṃ vistareṇa yojayitavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:679: āvṛṇotītyetāvati vaktavye āvriyate ceti vacanaṃ prabhādirūpasya sapratighatvavyavasthāpanārtham /
SA01abhsubhu:680: taddhyāvriyata eva nāvṛṇotītyeṣā tasya jātireṣa svabhāva ityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:682: yanna samādhivaśavarti rūpamiti samādhivaśena vartamānasyāpratighatvāt samacittakadevatāvata /
SA01abhsubhu:683: prakopapadasthānaṃ yatrāśraya ālaṃbane vā dveṣa utpadyate /
SA01abhsubhu:697: trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśaḥ saparivāramāryamārgamasaṃskṛtaṃ ca hitvā //
SA01abhsubhu:699: yāvanti sāsravāṇi tāvanti saraṇāṇītyevamādi tadānubaṃdhyārthena veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:706: kāmakāreṇa saṃmukhībhāvo vimukhībhāvaśca nāsaṃskṛtasya saṃbhavati nityatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:707: naivasaṃskṛtanāsaṃskṛtasya dvayāvyatirekādyaduktam - dvayamidaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cāsaṃskṛtaṃ ceti /
SA01abhsubhu:715: taccāsaṃskṛtaṃ ca sthāpayitvā trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśo draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:729_1: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ pramodabāhulyādbhogeṣu vihāre ca svavaśavarttanādyathāyogam /
SA01abhsubhu:734: pratibimbavibhutvanidarśanotpannaṃ jñeyaṃ vastu sabhāgaṃ vaimokṣikaṃ tāthāgataṃ ca rūpaṃ yathākramam /
SA01abhsubhu:750: svalakṣaṇasya vartamānasya pratyekaṃ pratiniyatasya viṣayasya grāhakaṃ pañcendriyajam /
SA01abhsubhu:755: yattāvadgrāhakaṃ grāhyamapi tat cakṣurādīnāmapi manovijñānena grāhyatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:763: daśānāṃ dhātūnāmiti saptānāṃ vijñānadhātūnāṃ rūpaśabdadharmadhātūnāṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:781: atītanirdeśādhikāreṇedamapi jñāpyate - kimartha bhagavatātītādīnyeva trīṇi kathāvastūni vyavasthāpitāni na nirvāṇamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:789: ruciḥ saṃtiṣṭhata iti na kevalaṃ rucirevopapattiprātilambhikā kiṃ tarhi saha taiḥ śraddhādibhiriti /
SA01abhsubhu:790: kuśalasya bhāvanā sarve śrutamayādayaḥ kuśalā dharmāveditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:794: tadanyaḥ kleśopakleśo duścaritasamutthāpaka iti sa punaryaḥ kāmā[va]caro 'naiḥsargikaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:798: kudṛṣṭipūrvakaṃ yatrānaśanādibhiḥ puṇyārthino varārthinaśca kliśyanta iti /
SA01abhsubhu:810: na kliṣṭaṃ nāpi kuśalaṃ ceto bhavati,
SA01abhsubhu:815: adhigamaniṣyandato 'vyākṛtaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ sahajāmiti yaiścittacaitasikaiḥ vikrīḍanārthaṃ nirmāṇaṃ nirmemīyate /
SA01abhsubhu:822: saha samādhilābhāt prahāṇābhirativipakṣabhūtasya dauṣṭhu[lya]sya prahāṇāt pradeśavairāgyamastīti veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:837: satkāyavairāgyaṃ vā punaradhikṛtya śaikṣasyaikadeśavairāgyamaśaikṣasya sakalavairāgyaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:841: daśavairāgyāṇītyatra prātikūlyārtho vairāgyārtho veditavyo nāvaśyaṃ prahāṇārthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:842: uccataraṃ sthānaṃ prāptavato nihīnesthāne ityuccataraṃ nagaraśraiṣṭhayādisthānaṃ prāptavato grāmamahattarādisthāne nihīne /
SA01abhsubhu:843: bālānāṃ nirvāṇa iti tasya śāntatvājñānāt satkāyābhiṣvaṅgācca /
SA01abhsubhu:844: pratilabdhadarśanamārgasya traidhātuka iti saṃskāraduḥkhatāṃ parijñātavataḥ sarvasāsrava[va]stunirvedāt /
SA01abhsubhu:845: prakṛtyā vairāgyaṃ prakṛtivairāgyaṃ yāvatprahāṇena vairāgyaṃ prahāṇavairāgyamiti padavigrahajātirveditavyā //
SA01abhsubhu:846: mokṣaprayuktasya kuśalaṃ śaikṣamiti saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārāvasthāyāḥ prabhṛtimokṣārtha prayuktasya veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:854: śaikṣasya kliṣṭāvyākṛtamityatra kliṣṭamakuśalaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam /
SA01abhsubhu:860: dṛṣṭisthānaṃ dṛṣṭisahabhuvo dharmāstadvījaṃ ca tathaiva vicikitsāsthānamapi veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:861: ye ca dṛṣṭau vipratipannāḥ kleśopakleśā iti ye dṛṣṭimukhena pravṛttā tadālaṃbanāśca rāgādayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:863: darśanaprahātavyāviparyayeṇa sāsravā iti parikalpitakliṣṭadṛṣṭayādikādanye sāsravā ityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:864: atra punaḥ sāsravagrahaṇena nirvedhabhāgīyānāmapi grahaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ dauṣṭhulyānubandhārthena /
SA01abhsubhu:876: na tu phalotpādanaṃ prati pratyayasya kācidīhetyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:878: na hyanutpādikāraṇāt kiṃcidutpadyamānaṃ kārya siddhamiti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:879: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityevamādi samarthapratyayotpattitāmupādāya nirīhakatvānityatve 'pi sati na yataḥ kutaścit pratyayāt sarvameva phalamutpadyate,
SA01abhsubhu:882: yānyavidyādīni dvādaśāṅgāni vibhaktāni tānyeva punaḥ samasya catvāryaṅgāni bhavantyākṣepā ṅgādīni /
SA01abhsubhu:883: etāvacca pravṛttinirdeśe nirdeṣṭavyam yaduta hetukāle yenākṣipyate yaccākṣipyate phalakāle yenābhinirvartyate yaccābhinirvatyate tadetatsarvamebhiraṅgainirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:886: ākṣiptāṅgaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā ca,
SA01abhsubhu:887: tayā cittavāsanayā nāmarūpādīnā māyatyāṃ pūrvotarasaṃniśrayakrameṇābhinirvṛtaye bījapuṣṭitaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:889_1: sopādāne vijñāne sati maraṇāvasthāyāṃ phaladānaṃ prati chandarāgānurūpyāntarakarmavāsanābhimukhībhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:891: tena prakāreṇa karmāntaravāsanābhimukhye satyanyatarasmin gatiyonyādibhedabhinne nikāyasabhāge yathākṣipte nāmarūpādinirvṛtteḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:894: na tvevaṃ jarāyujāyāṃ yonau vinā nāmarūpādibhiḥ ṣaḍāyatanādīnāṃ saṃbhava ityeṣāṃ pṛthagaṅgīkaraṇaṃ veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:916: nāmarūpamātmabhāvaṃ sattvān grāhayati tannivṛttyā sattvānāṃ nikāyasabhāgāntarabha janāt /
SA01abhsubhu:933: upādānaṃ punarbhavādānāya sopādānaṃ ca sattvānāṃ vijñānaṃ karoti,
SA01abhsubhu:944: jarāmaraṇaṃ punaḥpunarvayaḥ pariṇāmena jīvitapariṇāmena ca sattvān yojayati,
SA01abhsubhu:964: antareṇa eva kartāraṃ karma kriyā cāsti tatphalopabhogaścetyayamatra karmaphalāvipraṇāśo veditavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:977: na svayaṃ na parato dvividhakoṭipratikṣepe 'pi gambhīraḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ syāt prāgeva yatra catasro 'pi koṭayaḥ pratikṣipyante,
SA01abhsubhu:990: parato vā ghoṣaṃ pratītyādhyātmaṃ ca yoniśo manaskāraṃ samyagdṛṣṭistato yāvatsarvāsravakṣaya iti /
SA01abhsubhu:995: jarāmaraṇaṃjarāmara[ṇa]samudayo [jarāmaraṇanirodho] jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminī pratipaditi satyavyavasthānamadhikṛtya pratilomanirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:997: kasminnasati na jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati kasya nirodhājjarāmaraṇanirodha iti pratilomanirdeśataḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:998: hetupratyaya ālayavijñānaṃ kuśalavāsanā ca sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ yathākramam /
SA01abhsubhu:1005: api khalu svabhāvato 'pītyevamādinā ṣaḍḍhetavo hetupratyaya iti darśayati /
SA01abhsubhu:1033: tadyathā bhūtāni bhautikaṃ ceti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ na tvavaśyaṃ sarvatra saṃghāte catvāri mahābhūtāni bhavanti rūpādikaṃ vā bhautikam /
SA01abhsubhu:1034: ityato yadyatrāsti tattena sahotpadyate nānyonyaṃ vineti //
SA01abhsubhu:1041: ye dharmāḥ sahabhāvenālaṃbanaṃ pratipadyante nānyatama vaikalyena te saṃpratipattitaḥ saṃprayuktakaheturvyavasthāpyate,
SA01abhsubhu:1045: yā aparānte uttarottarā puṣṭataratamā pravṛttiriti taiḥ paripoṣitabījānāṃ tadanvayānāmanāgate kāle viśiṣṭotpattito draṣṭavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:1047_0: sarvatragaheturna kevalaṃ sadṛśasyaiva puṣṭaye kiṃ tarhi yasya kasyacidrāgādeḥ kleśasyābhyāsena
SA01abhsubhu:1050: nairantaryasamanantarato 'pīti nāvaśyaṃ kṣaṇanairantarya kiṃtarhi cittāntaranairantaryamapyatra nairantarya draṣṭavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1051: itarathā hyacittikasamāpattau vyutthānacittasya samāpatticittaṃ na samanantarapratyayaḥ syāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1053: tasmādekasmin saṃtāne paścimasya cittasya pūrvakaṃ cittaṃ cittāntareṇānantaritaṃ (Abhidh-s-bh 38)
SA01abhsubhu:1056: sabhāgavisabhāgacittacaittotpattisama[na]ntarato 'pīti kuśalāḥ cittacettāḥ kuśalānāṃ sabhāgānāmakuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ ca visabhāgānāmanantarotpannānāṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1058: tadyathā kāmāvacarā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarānāsravāṇāṃ cānantarotpannānāṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1059: evaṃ rūpāvacarādayo 'pi pṛthagpṛthagrūpāvacarādonāṃ kāmāvacarādīnāṃ cā[na]ntarotpannānāmiti yojayitavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:1060: kiṃ khalu sarvasya cintasyānantaraṃ sarva cittamutpadyate,
SA01abhsubhu:1063: avaitasya cittasyānantaramidaṃ cedaṃ ca cittamutpadyata ityucyamāne bahuvaktavyaṃ jāyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1065_0: tadyathā daśabhirbalaiścittasyotpādo veditavyaḥ - paricayabalena chandabalena prayogabalena
SA01abhsubhu:1072: adhimātreṇa yatheṣṭaṃ sarvāṇi vā vyutkrāmyānulomaṃ pratilomaṃ ca samāpattirveditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:1073: chandabalena dvitīyadhyānalābhī prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpanno yadyākāṃkṣati dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ vyutthānacittamāmukhīkarotyatha nā kāṃkṣati kāmāvacaraṃ kuśalamanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ vā /
SA01abhsubhu:1075: prayogabalena kāmāvacarasya kuśalasyavānantaraṃ tatprathamato rūpāvacaraṃ cittamutpadyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1077: maulasya kuśalasyānantaraṃ dvitīyadhyānasamāpannakamityevamādi vistareṇa yāvadbhavāgrāt veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1081_0: tadvirodhi kleśasaṃprayuktasya punaścittasya hetvādibhiśca turbhirbalaiḥ samudācāro
SA01abhsubhu:1082: viṣayabalena yadi rāgādyutpatyanukūlaḥ śubhādinimittaḥ prabhāvotkaṭaviṣaya ābhāsasamāgato bhavati,
SA01abhsubhu:1085: pratisaṃdhibalena nava maraṇacittānyātmabhāvatṛṣṇāsaṃprayuktāni triṣu dhātuṣupratyekaṃ kāmarūpārūpyāvacarāṇi /
SA01abhsubhu:1086: tatra kāmadhātoścyutvā kāmadhātāveva pratisaṃdhi vadhnataḥ kāmāvacaramātmabhāvatṛṣṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ maraṇacittaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1088: tathā rūpārūpyadhātubhyāṃ cyutvā tatra vānyatra votpadyamānasya ṣaṭcittāni yojayitavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:1092: āryāṇāmapyavītarāgāṇāṃ maraṇakāle yāvadaspaṣṭasaṃjñāvasthāṃ na gacchati tāvadasau tṛṣṇā samudācarati /
SA01abhsubhu:1094: vītarāgāṇāṃ tvāryāṇāṃ pratipakṣasya valīyastvānnaivāsau samudācaratyaprahīṇāpi satī /
SA01abhsubhu:1102: bodhisattvānāṃ tu praṇidhānabalenopapadyamānānāṃ maraṇacittādikamekāntena sarva kuśalaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1111: savastukaviṣayālaṃbanato dṛṣṭimasmimānaṃ tatsaṃprayuktāṃśca dharmān sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣāmālaṃbanam /
SA01abhsubhu:1121: ālaṃbanapratyaye viniścayaḥ - lakṣaṇato 'pi prabhedato 'pi sthitito 'pi parijñānato 'pi prahāṇato 'pyālavanavyavasthānaṃ veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:1136: sabhāgamālaṃbanaṃ tadyathā kuśalādīnāṃ kuśalādīni svabhūmikānāṃ ca svabhūmikaṃ sāsravāṇāṃ ca sāsravamanāsravāṇāṃ cānāsravam /
SA01abhsubhu:1150: tattvamālaṃbanaṃ tadyathā tathatā ṣoḍaśānāṃ cākārāṇāṃ satyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:1162: trividhaṃ jñānaṃ vaśitājñānaṃ vipaśyanājñāna nirvikalpajñānaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:1180: śrāvakayānāśrayaparivṛttyā skandhadhātvāyatanālaṃbanebhyo vimokṣo na tu teṣu vibhutvalābhaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1188: paurāṇaṃ sāsravakarma vipākasyetyevamādi sahabhāvādhipatitaḥ cittaṃ caitasānām,
SA01abhsubhu:1205: vijñānasahitasya vijñānasādṛśyenendriyasya viṣayeṣu prabandhenotpatteḥ vijñānavṛttisādṛśyārthena tadindriyaṃ sabhāgamityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1225: duḥkhā vedanā duḥkhātmikā satī svenaiva lakṣaṇena duḥkhaduḥkhatāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1227: sukhāyā vedanāyāstadvedanīyānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ vipariṇāmena daurmanasyotpādāt tadvipariṇatirvipariṇāmaduḥkhatā /
SA01abhsubhu:1228: tatra cānunayena cittasya vipariṇamanaṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā veditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:1244: ālayavijñānāttadanyattu cakṣurādikaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhādikaṃ ca tadvipākrajamityākhyāṃ labhate tato jātamiti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:1268: tatra parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ skandhādīnyadhiṣṭhāyāvidyamāna ātmādisvabhāvo yaḥ parikalpitaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1281: lakṣaṇasaṃgraheṇa rūpaskandho rūpaskandhenaiva saṃgṛhīto vistareṇa yāvaddharmāyatanaṃ dharmāyata[ne]naiva /
SA01abhsubhu:1284: jātisaṃgraheṇa skandhaiḥ rāśyādyarthayuktā rūpādayaḥ sarve saṃgṛhītā vilakṣaṇā apyanyonyaṃ svalakṣaṇenaikajātīyatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1286: avasthāsaṃgraheṇa skandhā ekajātīyā api sukhādyavasthāṃ niyamayya sukhāvasthāḥ sukhāvasthaireva saṃgṛhītā na duḥkhādyavasthaiḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1288: yathā skandhā evaṃ dhātava āyatanāni ca /
SA01abhsubhu:1289: sahāyasaṃgraheṇa rūpaskandhaḥ saha tadāśritairvedanādibhiḥ sahāyairgṛhyamāṇaḥ pañcabhiḥ skandhaiḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1290: evaṃ vedanādayāpi pratyekaṃ saparivārā gṛhyamāṇāḥ pañcabhiḥ skandhaiḥ saṃgṛhītā bhavanti /
SA01abhsubhu:1291: tathā dhātava āyatanāni ca saparivārāṇi pratyekaṃ sarvardhātubhirāyataneśca saṃgṛhītāni veditavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:1296: evaṃ kṛtvā yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ sūtrāntareṣu teṣāmanyatamasaṃgraha ekadeśasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1300: evaṃ kṛtvā yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaṃḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ sūtrāntareṣu teṣāmaśeṣataḥ saṃgrahaḥ sakalasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1302: yathāyogamevaṃ dhātavaḥ skandhāyatanarāyatanāni skandhadhātubhiḥ saṃgṛhītāni [iti] vistareṇāvagantavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:1307: araṇyasaṃgṛhītā mṛgā iti loke ucyate tathehāpi cakṣurādibhiḥ cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1308: nibandhasaṃgraho yathā rajjvādinā kāṣṭhabhārādikasya tathā kāyena cakṣurādonāmindriyāṇām /
SA01abhsubhu:1309: tulyārthasaṃgraho yathā samānasarvaprayojanānāṃ visrambhiṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ parasparaṃ tarthakālaṃbanapravṛttānāṃ saṃprayuktānāmānyonyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1310: upādānasaṃgraho yathā svāminā ātmīyataḥ parigrahītādīnā dāsādīnāṃ tathālayavijñānenātmabhāvasya /
SA01abhsubhu:1311: avisārasaṃgraho yathā ghaṭenodakasya tathā samādhinā tadanyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānām /
SA01abhsubhu:1312: abhisaṃkṣepa[saṃ]graho yathā samudreṇa nadīnāṃ tathā rūpaskandhena cakṣurādonāmiti /
SA01abhsubhu:1314: paramāṇudeśe sarveṣāṃ deśināmityekaparamāṇuparyāpannānāṃ rūpādīnāmavinirbhāgaḥ samānadeśatvena veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1315: paramāṇorūrdhva sarveṣāṃ deśināṃ miśrībhāvaḥ tadyathā kaluṣe pānīye appṛthivīparamāṇūnāṃ paramparam /
SA01abhsubhu:1316: deśināmeva samudāyināmanyonyaṃ samavadhānaṃ tadyathā bhittau mṛtpiṇḍena mṛtpiṇḍāntarasya /
SA01abhsubhu:1319: saṃpratipattisaṃprayogaḥ parabhāvena na svabhāvena tadyathā cittaṃ cittāntareṇa na saṃprayujyate,
SA01abhsubhu:1324: sarvatragaḥ saṃpratipattisaṃprayoga vedanādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ sarvāsvavasthāsveṣāṃ vinānyonyamabhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1325: ucitastadekatyānāṃ ca śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāmityekāntalaukikānāṃ kuśalānāmakuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam /
SA01abhsubhu:1328: samanvāgamo lakṣaṇataḥ pūrvavattadyathā kuśalādīnāṃ dharmāṇāmācayāpacaye prāptiḥ pratilambhaḥ samanvāgama iti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1329: bījasamanvāgama iti kāmadhātau jātau bhūtastraidhātukaiḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ samanvāgata ityavītarāgaṃ pṛthagjanamadhikṛtyaitadvaiditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1330: vītarāgastu tatrordhvaṃ vā jāto yato bhūmervītarāgastadbhūmikairasamanvāgataḥ samanvāgataśca,
SA01abhsubhu:1334: yasya yasya prakārasya pratipakṣa utpanna iti bhāvanāprahātavyasyādhimātrādeḥ kleśasya /
SA01abhsubhu:1336: vaśitāsamanvāgamaḥ prāyogikānāṃ kuśalānāmiti śrutamayādīnāṃ satyapi bīje tadabhyāsakṛtāṃ tajjanmikīṃ bījapuṣṭimantareṇa saṃmukhīkartumaśakyatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1341: yasyaivaṃ tathatāyāṃ kleśadauṣṭhulyaṃ saṃniviṣṭaṃ bhavati tatsati pratipakṣānukūlapratyayalābhe śakyate samuddhātayitum,
SA01abhsubhu:1349: yaśca sattvaloko yaśca bhājanalokaḥ karmakleśajanitaḥ karmakleśādhipateya ityābhyāṃ tayoḥ sattvabhājanalokayorduḥkhatvakāraṇaṃ jñāpayati //
SA01abhsubhu:1350: api khalu jātirduḥkhamityevamādi pūrvaṃ samasya duḥkhasatyalakṣaṇaṃ vyutpādyādhunā duḥkhasatyamārabhya sūtroktasya nirdeśasyārtha vibhaktumārabhate //
SA01abhsubhu:1351_0: jātirduḥkhaṃ saṃvādaduḥkhatāṃ tadanyadukhasvāśrayatāṃ copādāyeti mātuḥ kukṣāvāmapakvāśayayorantarāle
SA01abhsubhu:1353: ṣaṭ samānānyaṣṭau bhavanti vipariṇatidukhaṃ tridhā kṛtvā //
SA01abhsubhu:1365: tatpuna rasallakṣaṇaṃ yathā nāsti sarvadā duḥkhasatyamā[tmā]tmoyasvabhāvamiti yo 'rthaḥ so 'rtho 'nityaṃ duḥkhasatyamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:1369: viyogalakṣaṇaṃ tadavastheṣveva vastuṣu svabhāvavaśitvabhraṃśaḥ kvacitparaiḥ svīkaraṇamapi veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1379: prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānasthānāvasāne lokasaṃniveśe saṃvṛtte tadūrdhvaṃ yānyavaśiṣyante dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānasyānāntarāṇi tāni tāsāṃ śīrṣāṇi veditavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:1382: taireva tu sarvairjāyamānaiḥ saha tāni vimānāni nirvartante cyavamānaiḥ saha (Abhidh-s-bh 51)
SA01abhsubhu:1392: tasminnāyatane upapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyakarmaṇa upayuktatvādabhāvādvā tatra bhūyo 'nutpattito veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:1402: saṃskārānityatāṃ saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ ca saṃdhāyoktam - mayā yatkiṃcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyetyayamaduḥkhāsukhasya sukhasya ca veditasya duḥkha vacane 'bhisaṃdhirveditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1403: duḥkhasya tu veditasya duḥkhatvena prasiddhatvālloke na tatra punarabhisaṃdhirucyata iti /
SA01abhsubhu:1404: yeṣu cānityeṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādikaṃ prajñāyate [teṣām] anityatvāt duḥkhamityabhisaṃdhirveditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1412: tasya yena yena prakāreṇa parikalpyate tena tena prakāreṇābhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1416: kṣaṇikalakṣaṇā tu na prasiddhā sarvasaṃskārāṇāmataḥ sā prasādhayitavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:1417: tatra cittacaitasikānāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ loke prasiddhamataḥ tenāprasiddhaṃ rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasādhyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1423: tathāhi kāyaḥ savijñānaka eva samudāgacchati vijñānāpakrāntyā ca pūtībhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:1426: cittasya hi [vi]kāreṇa kāyasya vikāro dṛśyate sukhaduḥkharāgadveṣādyavasthāsu /
SA01abhsubhu:1427: ataḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ vikāriṇaścetaso 'nuvidhānāt kāyasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ siddham /
SA01abhsubhu:1429: cittasya hi sendriyaḥ kāya āśrayaḥ prasiddhaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:1430: yasya ca ya utpatyāśrayo nāsau svavināśamantareṇa tasyāśrayībhavandṛṣṭaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1436: ye hetavo ye pratyayāḥ rūpasyātpādāya te 'pyanityāḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:1437: anityān khalu hetupratyayān pratītyotpannaṃ rūpaṃ kuto nityaṃ bhaviṣyatīti sūtrapadānusāreṇa /
SA01abhsubhu:1444: na hi pratikṣaṇaprakṛtivikāritāmantareṇākasmiko rūpasyānte vikāro yuktaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:1449: ataḥ pratyayāntaranirapekṣo 'vaśyaṃbhāvī vināśa utpannamātrasyaiva bhāvasya na bhavati paścādbhatīti [na] kiṃcidviśeṣaṇamasti /
SA01abhsubhu:1456: asti sarvabhūtikaḥ sa evārdra uṣṇaśca mṛtpiṇḍo gamanāvasthāyāmiti /
SA01abhsubhu:1464: itya[nya]trāpi yadyatropalabhyate bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ vā tatra tadastīti veditavyaṃ nānyatra /
SA01abhsubhu:1467: buddhyā paryantabhedatastu paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ buddhyā yāvānavayapāpakarṣaparyantaḥ śakyate prabhettuṃ tāvatā paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ kriyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1468: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ yadevaṃ niḥśarīro 'pi paramāṇurvyavasthāpyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1470: avayavaśo hi buddhyā bhidyamāne rūpe sarvametadekaṃ rūpamiti piṇḍasaṃjñā vigacchati,
SA01abhsubhu:1473: evaṃ hi buddhyā bhidyamānaṃ rūpaṃ na kiṃcidbhavatīti matvā rūpadravyasyāpariniṣpattiṃ praviśati,
SA01abhsubhu:1476_1: yathākramaṃ tadvipulamasaṃlikhitaṃ ca veditavyam saṃlikhitaṃ tadevotpannamokṣabhāgīyānām,
SA01abhsubhu:1486: paraṃ saptāhaṃ tiṣṭhatyantareṇa ca cyavate yadyupapattipratyayān labhate /
SA01abhsubhu:1487: atha na labhate saptāhātpareṇa cyutvā punarantarābhava eva nivartate /
SA01abhsubhu:1488: evaṃ yāva[t] saptakṛtvaḥ tataḥ pareṇa ekadā ca vyāvartate yadi tadavasthā syādyatropapattipratya[ya] /
SA01abhsubhu:1489: balavanta āmukhībhūtā bhavanti caturthadhyānalābhino 'rhattvābhimānino bhikṣostadbhūmikāntarābhavābhinirvṛttau mokṣāpavādi kamithyādṛṣṭipratilambhānnārakāntarābhavābhinirvṛttivat /
SA01abhsubhu:1492: sabhāgāṃśca sattvānpaśyati yaiḥ saha pūrva tatkuśalamakuśalaṃ vā caritaṃ bhavati taiḥ saha vartamānamātmānaṃ svapna iva saṃjānīte /
SA01abhsubhu:1494: tata ūrdhvamindriyābhinirvṛttiryathā pratītyasamutpāda iti nāmarūpādyānupūrvyā / yathoktam -
SA01abhsubhu:1502: kleśāḥ kleśādhipateyaṃ ca karma iti sāsravamityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1503: yadyevaṃ kimartha bhagavatā tṛṣṇaiva samudayanirdeśe nirdiṣṭā /
SA01abhsubhu:1517: ālayavijñānaṃ viśeṣeṇa saṃskāraduḥkhatāvasthaṃ tatra cātmasaṃmohasukhena tṛṣṇā pravṛttā veditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:1528: dṛṣṭeḥ prañcākāro bhedaḥ - satkāyadṛṣṭirantagrāhadṛṣṭimithyādṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśa iti //
SA01abhsubhu:1531: sā punaḥ ṣaḍākārā tadyathā vikṣepāpraśāntatā viparyāsāpraśāntatā auddhatyāpraśāntatā styānamiddhāpraśāntatā pramādāpraśāntatālajjāpraśāntatā ca //
SA01abhsubhu:1534: tatra cāyo niśomanaskāraḥ pratyavasthito bhavatīti tasminviṣaye śubhanimittādyudgrāhako rāgādyutpattyanukūlaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:1535: avidyā dṛṣṭivicikitsā ūrdhvabhūmyālaṃbanā api santi na punarāsāṃ sā bhūmiḥ sākṣādālaṃbanaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā svabhūmiḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:1539: na hi parabhūmikān saṃskārānahamityabhiniviśamāno dṛṣṭa iti /
SA01abhsubhu:1544: tat parikalpitaṃ tvasyālaṃbanamiti vaktavye tatparikalpastvasyālaṃbanamiti vacanam,
SA01abhsubhu:1551: pratigho mānena dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyate,
SA01abhsubhu:1552: na hi yo yatra vastuni pratihatastena sa unnatiṃ gacchati tadvā saṃtīrayituṃ śaknotīti,
SA01abhsubhu:1554: krodhādaya anyonyaṃ na saṃprayujyanta iti viruddhā viruddhairna saṃ[pra]yujyante /
SA01abhsubhu:1562: yadyena prakāreṇa yasmin vastuni saṃprayojayati tannirdeśena saṃyojananirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1572: dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena saṃprayukto mithyāni saraṇaṃ paryeṣata ityaha mokṣo mama mokṣo muktaśca nityo bhaviṣyāsyucchetsyāmi veti,
SA01abhsubhu:1575: āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ hitvā satkāyadṛṣṭayā tatpūrvakeṇa ca śīlavratena śuddhipratyayanāt //
SA01abhsubhu:1577: bāhyena hi bandhanena baddho dvayaṃ na labhate - gantuṃ ca na labhate,
SA01abhsubhu:1582: mithyā mokṣaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ ca santīrayantīti yathākramaṃ tisṛbhirdṛṣṭibhirdvābhyāṃ ca parāmarśābhyāṃ yathā saṃyojaneṣūktamiti //
SA01abhsubhu:1584: ṣaḍ rāgādīn kleśān sthāpayitvā tadanyaḥ kliṣṭaścaitasikaḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ krodhādiko veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1585: kuśalapakṣāntarāyāya yogināṃ punaḥpunarudvegena cittaṃ paryavanahyantīti paryavasthānāni /
SA01abhsubhu:1586: kuśalapakṣaḥ punaryathākālaṃ śamathapragrahopekṣānimittabhāvanā tatsaṃniśrayaśca brahmacaryādiśuddhisaṃgṛhītaṃ śīlam /
SA01abhsubhu:1605: abhidhyādayaḥ kāyagranthā iti na rūpakāyasyaite granthā veditavyāḥ kiṃtarhi samāhitacittasvabhāvasya kāyasya parigranthārthena granthāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1606: pṛthagdṛṣṭisaṃniśrayeṇedameva satyaṃ moghamanyadityabhiniviśya jñeyaṃ saṃtīrayatāmayoniśo jñeyasaṃtīraṇahetoḥ cittaṃ vikṣipyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1609: kuśalapakṣasyāsaṃprakhyānāya cittaṃ nivṛṇvantīti nivaraṇāni kuśalapravṛtterantarāyaṃ kurvantītyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1622: punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre jātijarāmaraṇayogena nidhnantīti nighāḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:1630: mithyādharmābhiniveśahetoḥ viparītadarśino mohena duścaritaṃ caranti yājñikādaya iti //
SA01abhsubhu:1633: ayoniśonimittamanuvyañjanaṃ ca grāhayitvā kāyaṃ cittaṃ ca paridahantīti paridāhāḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:1634: rūpādike vastuni ratyadhyavasānaṃ kārayitvā tadvipariṇāme śokādibhiḥ sattvānāyāsantītyu pāyāsāḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:1644: rāgo viṣaye dṛṣṭau ca vipratipanna iti bhāvanāprahātavyo darśanaprahātavyaśca yathākramam /
SA01abhsubhu:1645: śubhatāmātrālaṃbanatvādrāgasya yo 'pi sattveṣu rāgaḥ so 'pi viṣayamukhenaiva vipratipanno veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1646: evaṃ pratikūlamātrālaṃbanatvāt pratighasya sattveṣvapi pravartamāno viṣayamukhenaiva vipratipanno veditavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:1647: mānaḥ sattveṣu dṛṣṭau ca [vi]pratipannaḥ hīnādasmi śreyānityevamādyākārapravṛttatvātsatveṣu vipratipanno veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1649: śīlavrataparāmarśādiḥ dṛṣṭau vipratipannaḥ dṛṣṭidoṣeṇaiva śīlavratasya śuddhitaḥ parāmarśanāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1654: nirodhe mārge cottrāsasaṃjananato vipratipannāḥ kleśavaśātsaṃsāre 'bhiratasya vyavadānataḥ prapātasaṃjñātrāsāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1655: viparītakalpanataśca nirodhe mārge ca vipratipannā draṣṭavyāḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:1664: sarva upekṣayā pūrvavat sukhasaumanasyābhyāṃ na saṃprayujyate,
SA01abhsubhu:1673: yā parivṛttāśrayasya parivṛttivijñānāśritā cittatuṣṭiḥ cittaudvilyaṃ cittaharṣaḥ cittakalpatā sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatam /
SA01abhsubhu:1675: yatparivṛttāśrayasyālayavijñānāśrita āśrayānugrahata āśrayahlādaḥ sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:1677: sukhā vedanā prathamadvitīyayordhyānayorutpadyamānā yena cittacaitakalāpena saṃprayujyate taṃ ca harṣākāreṇa prīṇayati,
SA01abhsubhu:1679: atastadubhayakṛtyakaratvādubhayathaivāsyā vyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ prītiḥ sukhaṃ ceti /
SA01abhsubhu:1680: tasmāttayā saṃprayujyamāno mānaḥ sukhena saumanasyena ca saṃprayujyata ityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1681: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kāmadhātau daurmanasyena saumanasyena ca saṃprayujyate,
SA01abhsubhu:1687: rūpadhātau vicikitsottaradhyāyināmapi prītisukhaṃ samādhivalādhānenānuvartata eveti tatra sukhasaumanasyābhyāmapi saṃprayujyate //
SA01abhsubhu:1688: āveṇikāyā apyavidyāyā eṣa eva nayo draṣṭavyaḥ sukhasaumanasyābhyāṃ saṃprayogāsaṃprayogamārabhya //
SA01abhsubhu:1694: kāmadhatau daśa dukhadarśanaprahātavyā iti ye tatra tannidānapadasthānato vipratipannāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1695: evaṃ samudayādiṣu yathāyogaṃ vipratipannāstaddarśanaprahātavyā iti veditavyāḥ /

SA01abhsubhu:1706: yayā nirvāṇāt pratyudāvartate mānasaṃ paritrasanamupādāyātha kastarhi me ātmeti /

SA01abhsubhu:1727: etāni ca trīṇyānuttaryāṇi yathākramaṃ darśanabhāvanāniṣṭhāmārgānadhikṛtya veditavyāni //
SA01abhsubhu:1729: kāritrakarma pṛthivyādīnāṃ dhāraṇādi yadvā yasya svalakṣaṇakṛtyam /

SA01abhsubhu:1735: kāyādikarma karmapathā iti sūtrānusāreṇa yathāpradhānaṃ nirdeśo veditavyaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:1738: prāṇātipātādīnāṃ vastu sattvasaṃkhyātamasattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vā yathāyogaṃ yadadhiṣṭhāya prāṇātipātādayaḥ pravartante /

SA01abhsubhu:2278: pūrvotpāditāyāḥ paścātsaṃmukhobhāvo manuṣyeṣu vā tasminneva janmani rūpadhātau vā upapadya /
SA01abhsubhu:2281: ata evātra catuṣkoṭikaṃ bhavati - yo rūpavītarāgaḥ sarvaḥ sa ārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā,
SA01abhsubhu:2283: vā ārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā sarvaḥ sa rūpavītarāga iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2285: dvitīyā koṭiḥ - caturthadhyānalābhī ārya āryopapattyānarthī prahāṇamārgaṃ nirākṛtya viśeṣamārgaṃ niśrityārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā /
SA01abhsubhu:2286: tṛtīyā koṭiḥ - sa eva vairāgyārthī prahāṇamārgaṃ niśrityārūpyaśāntavimokṣasamāpattā /
SA01abhsubhu:2289: śāntena vihāreṇa vihartukāmā āryā manuṣyeṣvenāmabhinirhṛtya saṃmukhīkurvanti /
SA01abhsubhu:2290: ārūpyeṣu tūpapannāste 'prayatnenaiva vaipākikaiḥ paramaśāntaiḥ vimokṣavihārairviharantītyatastatsaṃmukhīkaraṇārthaṃ na punaḥ prayatnamārabhanta iti //
SA01abhsubhu:2291: mṛdumadhyādhimātro mārgaḥ pratyekaṃ punaḥ mṛdvādibhistribhiḥ prakārairbhittvā navaprakāro vyavasthāpyate,
SA01abhsubhu:2293: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ mṛdumṛdunā mārgeṇādhimātraḥ kleśaḥ prahīyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2294: sa hyatyarthaḥ vipannahrīvyapannāpyālajjinaḥ saṃtāne samudācarati sūpalakṣaścāsau suparicchedastasmādasau sthūlamalavadalpenāpi pratipakṣeṇāpanīyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2295_0: yastvayaṃ duṣparicchedasamudācāraḥ sūkṣmalīnaḥ saṃtāne mṛdumṛdukleśaḥ sūkṣmamalavanmahatā
SA01abhsubhu:2296_1: dauṣṭhulyāṅgasyāpagamātkrameṇāśrayaḥ parivartate sa bhāvanāmārge prayogamārge ityucyate //
SA01abhsubhu:2297: yasya tvanantaraṃ tatprakārakleśajātitatpakṣadauṣṭhulyāvaśeṣāpagamāttena dauṣṭhulyena nirdauṭhulya āśrayaḥ parivartate sa ānantaryamārgaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:2302: pūrvacintitādhigatadharmapratyavekṣaṇāvihāreṇa vā viharataḥ samāpattyantaraṃ vā samāpadyamānasya yo mārgaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2303: punarabhijñādīn vaiśeṣikān guṇānabhinirharatastairvā viharato yo mārgaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:2304: ityevaṃ bhāvanāmārga vistareṇa nirdiśya tadanuṣaṃgeṇa mārgabhāvanā varṇyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2314: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ - mārga utpadyamānaḥ svāṃ vāsanāṃ sthāpayati[sā]dhāsanā pratilambhabhāvanā,
SA01abhsubhu:2319: punaḥ pratipakṣasya vidūṣaṇādikaḥ caturvidhaḥ prabhedo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2362: punarbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pañcabhiḥ prakāraiḥ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam - ālambanataḥ svabhāvataḥ sahāyato bhāvanāto bhāvanāphalataśca //
SA01abhsubhu:2363: tatra smṛtyupasthānānāmālaṃbanaṃ yathākramaṃ kāyo vedanā cittaṃ dharmāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2366_0: bālāḥ prāyeṇa sendriyaṃ kāyamāśritya sukhādimupabhuñjānā upalabdhalakṣaṇā ātmarāgādibhiḥ
SA01abhsubhu:2366_1: śraddhādibhiśca saṃkliśyante vyavadāyante ceti vikalpayantyata āditaḥ samyaktadvastulakṣaṇaparīkṣārthamevaṃ
SA01abhsubhu:2379: kāye kāyasya sādṛśyena paśyanā kāye kāyānupaśyanā,
SA01abhsubhu:2381: adhyātmaṃ vedanādayo 'dhyātmaṃ kāyamupādāyotpannāḥ cakṣurādyālaṃbanatayā svāśrayotpannanatayā vā /
SA01abhsubhu:2388: alpamātrasaṃtuṣṭiḥ alaṃ me tāvatā kuśalapakṣeṇeti prativāraṇam /
SA01abhsubhu:2400: tathāhi tatpratipakṣabhūtā prasrabdhiḥ kāya eva viśeṣeṇotpadyata iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2404: nirātmakaṃ vijñānamātraṃ na bhaviṣyatīti paśyata ātmocchedāśaṅkāmukhena nirvāṇottrāsābhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2417: yadā śamathādinimittamanaskāreṇa nirapekṣālaṃbanaṃ kevalaṃ pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati tadā vyāyaccjhata ityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2418: yadā tulayopakleśe utpanne tadapakarṣaṇārtha prasadanīyādimanaskāraiḥ cittamunnāmayati, (Abhidh-s-bh 87)
SA01abhsubhu:2419: auddhatyopakleśe cotpanne pratyāsaṃkṣepamukhena cittaṃ dhārayati tadā vīryamārabhata ityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2428: chandasamādhiryat satkṛtyaprayogamāgamya spṛśati cittasyaikāgratāṃ tīvreṇa chandena tīvreṇādareṇa prayogaḥ satkṛtyaprayoga iti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:2430: tadvīryamityucyate yannityaṃ prayujyata eva na kadācinna prayujyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2431: cittasamādhiryatpūrvajanmāntare samādhibhāvanāmāgamyatatparipuṣṭabījatvāccittasya svarasena samādhyanukūlapariṇāme sati spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām /
SA01abhsubhu:2432: api khalu ṛddhipādābhinirhārayornidarśanārthameva samyakprahāṇabhāvanāyāṃ chandaṃ janayatītyevamādinirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2433: cittaṃ pradadhāti pragṛhṇātītyeṣā cātra pāṭhānupūrvī veditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:2434: tatra cittasamādhiryaccitaṃ pradadhat spṛśatīti pratyātmaṃ cittameva cittaṃ dhārayan śamayannabhisaṃkṣipannadhigacchatītyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2441: tathāhi yo yenārthī bhavati tatprāptyartha vyāyacchate /
SA01abhsubhu:2457: etacca yathā kramamadhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā - naca me chando 'tilīno bhaviṣyati,
SA01abhsubhu:2461: vivṛtena cetasāparyavanaddhena saprabhāsasahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmi na ca me 'ndhakārāyattatvaṃ bhaviṣyati cetasa iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2465: phalaṃ tadādhipatyādacireṇa kālena darśanamārgasyotpādaḥ tasminneva ca kāle nirvedhabhāgīyabhajanaṃ ca saṃtānasya //
SA01abhsubhu:2468: tathāhyeṣāṃ tacca yathoktam - āśradvyādivipakṣanirlekhaścādhika ityata evaiṣāṃ tulyānāmālaṃbanasvabhāvādikānāmapyanavamṛdyatārthaviśeṣeṇa bodhipakṣāntaratvam //
SA01abhsubhu:2487: bhāvanā smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritamityevamādirebhiḥ caturbhiḥ padairyathākramaṃ catuḥsatyālaṃbanā bodhyaṅgabhāvanā paridīpitā /
SA01abhsubhu:2488: tathāhi duḥkhaṃ duḥkhata ālaṃbamānasya tadvivekānveṣaṇādduḥkhālaṃbanaṃ vivekaniśritamityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2489: tṛṣṇālakṣaṇaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ duḥkhasamudayata ālaṃbamānasya tadvirāgānveṣaṇāttadālaṃbanaṃ virāganiśritam /
SA01abhsubhu:2496: mārgāṅgānāmālaṃbanaṃ darśanamārgāduttarakālaṃ saiva yathādṛṣṭānāṃ satyānāṃ yathābhūtatā /
SA01abhsubhu:2505: samyakkarmāntenābhikramapratikramādiṣu saṃpannacāritratayā śīlaviśuddhiḥ samyagājīvena yathānujñaṃ dharmeṇa cīvarādiparyeṣaṇādājīvaviśuddhiriti /
SA01abhsubhu:2515: pratipadāṃ dharmapadānāṃ ca pūrvavadarthanirdeśo veditavyaḥ dukhā pratipadanāgamyārūpyaniśritā yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanāmāndhāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2520: tasya cittasyaivamādita upanibaddhasya calasyaudārikasya tasminnevālaṃbane saṃtatiyogena sūkṣmīkaraṇena cābhisaṃkṣepaḥ saṃsthāpanā /
SA01abhsubhu:2523: pūrvameva vikṣepanimitteṣu rūpādiṣvādīnavasaṃjñāmadhipati kṛtvā cittasya prasarādānaṃ damanam /
SA01abhsubhu:2529: tatra caritaviśodhanamālaṃbanaṃ kauśalyālaṃbanaṃ vā kleśaviśodhanaṃ vā yāvadbhāvikatayā (Abhidh-s-bh 91)
SA01abhsubhu:2533: api khalu [śamatha]vipaśyanāmāgamya catvāro mārgā iti catvāro mārgopadeśanāmadhikṛtya /
SA01abhsubhu:2534: tatra prathamaḥ śamathasya lābhitvādabhiniṣīdanneva cittaṃ sthāpayati yāvatsamādhatte,
SA01abhsubhu:2535: vipaśyānāyā alābhitvāttu samādhiṃ niśritya paścāttathāniṣaṇṇastān dharmānvicinoti yāvatparimīmāṃsāmāpadyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2539: śrutodgrahaṇamukhena vivaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti tatpūrvakaṃ ca śamathe /
SA01abhsubhu:2541: ajñātamājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ prayogamārge nirvedhabhāgīyasaṃgṛhīte pañcadaśasu ca darśanamārgacittakṣaṇeṣu yadindriyam,
SA01abhsubhu:2560: yataścakṣurādayo dharmāḥ sanāmābhiniveśāḥ punaḥ punaḥ pravartanta iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2584: yathoktaṃ - “tasya cetovimukteḥ pāripūryā prajñāvimukteḥ pāripūryā kāyadauṣṭhulyānāṃ pratiprasrabdheḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2585: smṛtyā samanvāgamahetorevamasya prathamaṃ dvāraṃ sudāntaṃ bhavati suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāṣitam,
SA01abhsubhu:2586: yaduta cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣvevaṃ yāvanmano vijñeyeṣu dharmeṣvi“ti //
SA01abhsubhu:2588: sa ca samādhirnirantarastatpravāharaya laukikena mārge ṇāntarākhaṇḍanāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2592: etadarthapratibimbanārtha bhagavatoktam - tadyathā mahāśailaḥ parvato 'khaṇḍo 'cchidro 'śuṣira ekadhanaḥ susaṃvṛta iti //
SA01abhsubhu:2597: mārgāśrayaparivṛtiḥ pūrvaṃ laukiko mārgo 'bhisamayakāle lokottaratvena parivṛtaḥ śaikṣaścocyate sāvaśeṣakaraṇīyatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2598: yadā tu nirhatāśeṣavipakṣo bhavati traidhātukavairāgyāttadāsya mārgasvabhāvasyāśrayasya paripūrṇā parivṛttirvyavasthāpyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2600: kṣaye sati, viṣaye vā tasmin yajjñānaṃ kṣayajñānametaduktaṃ bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:2601: niravaśeṣaṃ prakṣīṇe samudaye yajjñānaṃ tadavasthasya hetunirodhālaṃbanaṃ vā kṣayajñānamiti //
SA01abhsubhu:2602: tathānutpāde sati viṣaye vā tasmin yajjñānamanutpādajñānam āyatyāṃ sarvasya duḥkhasyātyantamanutpattidharmatāyāṃ satyāṃ yajjñānamanyasatyālaṃbanamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:2618: viparyayeṇa lokottarāḥ supraviṣṭā nirāvaraṇāśca santo nirvikalpatayā laukikebhyo viśiṣyante /
SA01abhsubhu:2627: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatastamabhipretamartha vivṛtyaiva na deśayatītyāha daśānuśaṃsān saṃpaśyaṃstathāgataḥ sūcanākāreṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA01abhsubhu:2637: bhāvagamyo 'yaṃ dharma ityavagamya jātāsthasya tasmin dharme ādaramukhena śraddhādisaṃbhāraparipūraṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2643: abhiprāyārtha tīvreṇa yogena cintayitvā labdhavataḥ prāmodyaviśeṣādhigamāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2646: ata eva paṇḍitaḥ paṇḍita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati,
SA01abhsubhu:2650: udānaṃ yadāttamanaskenodāhṛtam tadyathā yadā ime prādurbhavanti dharmā ityevamādi //
SA01abhsubhu:2651: nidānaṃ yatkiṃcideva pudgalamuddiśya bhāṣitaṃ sotpattikaśikṣā prajñaptikabhāṣitaṃ vā,
SA01abhsubhu:2678: punaḥ sūtrapiṭakaṃ niśritya vineyāḥ śikṣātraye vyutpadyante,
SA01abhsubhu:2688: abhidharmaṃ niśritya parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaviniścayakṛtena dharmasaṃbhogena sparśavihāro bhavati,
SA01abhsubhu:2700: śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ koṭirityevaṃ sarvāsūttarāsu saṃkhyāsvavaśyamanayoḥ daśaśatasaṃkhyayoranyataropaniṣadbhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:2701: ata ete eva samasya daśaśatānyeko dharmaskandho vyavasthāpyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2702: anayā ca gaṇanayā caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇyaṣṭau koṭyaḥ catvāriśacca lakṣā bhavanti //
SA01abhsubhu:2703: sa eṣa piṭakatrayasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ kasya gocaraḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2709: ākāraḥ, yān skandhādīnartha prakārānārabhya sā deśanā,
SA01abhsubhu:2712: tatra deśanākāle paravijñaptirāśrayo yo 'sāvucyate parato ghoṣata iti tata uttarakālaṃ smṛtirāśrayo yathāśrutamanusmṛtyābhyasanāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2719: yāvadbhāvikatayā dharmāṇāmetāvanti sarvadharmavastuni yajjñeyavyavasthānam tadyathā skandhadhātvāyatanāni /
SA01abhsubhu:2721: tadyathā satyamukhena tānyeva skandhadhātvāyatanāni yathāsaṃbhavaṃ duḥkhatojñeyāni yāvanmārgataḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2724: dharmoddānādhikāreṇa vānityataḥ sarvasaṃskārā jñeyā yāvacchāntato nirvāṇam /
SA01abhsubhu:2728: yathāvadbhāvikatāyā nirdaśe ṣoḍaśaprakārā uktāstrayaśca vimokṣākārāḥ teṣāṃ cānyonyasaṃgrahaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2737: na hyeṣāṃ nirhetuka utpādo nāpīśvarādiviṣamahetuka iti yajjñānamidaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2739: tadyathā sucaritasyeṣṭo vipāko duścaritasyāniṣṭa ityevamādi yajjñānamidaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:2755: udakena kleda ityevamādikā prasiddhā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā /
SA01abhsubhu:2756: yathoktaṃ cakṣuḥ samṛddhaṃ śūnyaṃ nityena yāvadātmīyena /
SA01abhsubhu:2759: nāmaparyeṣaṇā nāmakāyādīnāṃ prajñaptisattvādapariniṣpannameṣāṃ svalakṣaṇamiti yā vicāraṇā /
SA01abhsubhu:2760: vastuparyeṣaṇā skandhādīnāṃ tathāpariniṣpattiryathā nāmakāyādibhirabhilapyanta iti yā saṃtīraṇā parīkṣaṇetyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2764: tathāhi vyutpannavyavahārasyābhidhānamātraṃ śrutvā tadabhidheye saṃpratyaya utpadyate smṛtimukhena,
SA01abhsubhu:2766: ityevaṃvidhe saṃbandhe prasiddhe cakṣurityevamādisvalakṣaṇaprajñaptimātraṃ tadākhyāmāsapiṇḍādivyavahārasya nimittaṃ bhavatīti yā parīkṣeyamucyate svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā /
SA01abhsubhu:2771: tatra ādhāro yādṛśaṃ bāhuśrutyaṃ śamathavipaśyanayoḥ pratiṣṭhā bhavatyālaṃbanayogena tadādhāra ityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2779_0: kathaṃ ca punaḥ bodhisattva ekasyāṃ yaugabhūmau prayukto nopalambhaṃ spṛśati saṃbhṛtapuṇyajñāna
SA01abhsubhu:2781: niśritya dhyāyati tattasmātsamāhitāccittādananyaditi saṃpaśyaṃstasmin pratibimbe viṣayasaṃjñāṃ vyāvartya tadākāraṃ svasaṃjñāmātramavadhārayati /
SA01abhsubhu:2782: tadā cāsau svacittamātrāvasthānādadhyātma sthitacitto bhavan sarvathā grāhyabhāvaṃ prativedayate /
SA01abhsubhu:2783: tataśca grāhyābhāvādgrāhakamapi na pariniṣpannamiti tasyāpyabhāvaṃ parivedayate /
SA01abhsubhu:2785: etadeva cādhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā pratibimbaṃ manaḥ paśyanniti vistaraḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2788: sā ceyaṃ yogabhūmirhetutaḥ phalataśca nirdiṣṭā veditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:2791_1: ca gṛhṇātītyatra sūtre taireva pañcabhirdharmairlaghugrahaṇādīni catvāri yathāyogaṃ veditavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:2801: dharmavihārī bhikṣurdharmavihāri bhikṣuriti bhadantocyata ityatra sūtre bhagavatā samastena śrutacintābhāvanāvihāreṇa dharmavihāro bhavati,
SA01abhsubhu:2803: tatra paryāptisvādhyāyadeśanābahulā vitarkaṇā bahulāścetyanena kevalaṃ śrutacintāprayuktā na bhāvanāprayuktā yogādiriñcanādato [na] dharmavihāriṇo vyavasthāpyante /
SA01abhsubhu:2804: yo 'pi kaścicchrutacintāmanāgamya kevalaṃ bhāvanāprayuktaḥ syātso 'pi na dharmavihārī vyavasthāpyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2805: tata eva tāvaddharmavihāriṇaṃ bhikṣumārabhya iha tu bhikṣurddharmaṃ paryāpnoti sūtraṃ geyamiti vistareṇoktvā paścādāha na riñcati yogamityevamādi,
SA01abhsubhu:2806: yathā vijñāyeta śrutaṃ cintāṃ bhāvanāṃ cāgamya tadubhayavihāreṇa dharmavihārīti /
SA01abhsubhu:2807: na riñcati yogamityevamādinā samādhiprayogāsaṃtuṣṭibhyāṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ saṃdarśitam /
SA01abhsubhu:2809: punardvividhaḥ saṃdarśitaḥ sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogasaṃgṛhītaśca na riñcati yogamityanena,
SA01abhsubhu:2818: sarvākārayorvodhisattvābhyudayaniḥśreyasamārgayostisṛbhistisṛbhiśca saṃgrahāt ṣaḍevapāramitā na bhūyasyo nālpoyasya itīyaṃ tanmātrasaṃkhyā //
SA01abhsubhu:2852: yadbodhisattvasya bodhisattvadharmatāyāṃ vyavasthitasya bodhicittaṃ niśritya karuṇāpuraḥsareṇa cetasā sarvāstiparityāge kāyavāṅmanaskarma /
SA01abhsubhu:2853: evaṃ ca kṛtvā dānapāramitāyāḥ lakṣaṇaṃ gotrataḥ praṇidhānata āśayato vastutaḥ svabhāvataśca nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2858: kāyavāṅmanaskarmasvabhāva ityevaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2860: śīlakṣāntivīryapāramitāsu yathākramaṃ sarvasaṃvarasamādānānurakṣāyāṃ sarvāpakāraduḥkhamarṣaṇādhivāsanāyāṃ sarvakuśaladharmasamudānayanatāyāṃ yatkāyavāṅmanaskarmeti veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2862: prajñāpāramitā[yāṃ] sarvākārakāyavāṅmanaskarmavibhutve yaḥ sarvākāro dharmapravicaya iti vaktavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2864: punaryaddānaṃ sarvajñatāmārabhya sarvajñatāyai saṃvartate sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti sarvajñatākṛtyaṃ ca karoti taddānapārimitetyucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2865: etāni punaścatvāri padāni yathākramamārambhato vāsanātaḥ kāyato nisyandataśca veditavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:2869: tadeva yadā paripūrṇaṃ bhavati tadā dharmakāyapariniṣpādanayogena sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA01abhsubhu:2872_1: bodhisattvo mahāntamapi bhogaskandhaṃ prahāya śīlasamādānaṃ karoti /
SA01abhsubhu:2873: śīlānurakṣī - ākruṣṭena mayā na pratyākroṣṭavyam - ityevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ kṣamo bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:2877: saṃpannadhyānaśca samāhitacitto yathābhūtajñānāllokottarāṃ prajñāṃ pratilabhata iti //
SA01abhsubhu:2924: niṣpattiparamatvaṃ daśamyāṃ bhūmau tāthāgatyāṃ ca bodhisattvapariniṣpattyā buddhapariniṣpattyā ceti //
SA01abhsubhu:2929: punaḥ parānātmānaṃ ca paramāmīti tārayantoti pāramitāḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:2936: kṣaticittaṃ punaryenāpa kāriṇāṃ pratyapakāraḥ kriyate tasyāgatasyānayā vilopanaṃ tiraskaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2937: kṣatameṣāṃ vairaṃ vidyata iti kṣatinasteṣāmabhayaprakāśanaṃ kṣemasyāviṣkaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2940: vṛddhaye īhā kuśaladharmasamudāgamāya dvābhyāṃ samyakprahāṇābhyāṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2949: tatra parapraṇītajñānaṃ parato ghoṣānvayā yoniśomanaskārasaṃprayuktā prajñā,
SA01abhsubhu:2957: hetusaṃniśritā yo gotrabalena pāramitāsu pratipattyabhyāsaḥ vipākasaṃniśritā ya ātmabhāvasaṃpattibalena /
SA01abhsubhu:2966: āśayasaṃniśritā pāramitābhāvanā ṣaḍākārā - atṛptāśayena vaipulyāśayena muditāśayenopakarāśayena nirlepāśayena kalyāṇāśayena ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2968: yathā caikasattvasyaivaṃ yāvān sattvadhāturanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2969: tamanena paryāyeṇa pratipādayedatṛpta eva bodhisattvasya dānāśaya iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2971: na ca bodhisattva evaṃrūpāṃ dānaparaṃparāṃ kṣaṇamātramapi hāpayati vicchinattyābodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāditi /
SA01abhsubhu:2972: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne vipulāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2975: na ca te sattvāstena dānenānugṛhyamāṇā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2976: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne muditāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2977: upakaratarāṃśca bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā dānenopakaroti nātmānam,
SA01abhsubhu:2979: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne upakarāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2980: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tathā vipulamapi dānamayaṃ puṇyamabhisaṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vārthī bhavati vipākena veti /
SA01abhsubhu:2981: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2982: yadbodhisattvastathā vipulasyāpi dānaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:2984: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2987: etena paryāyeṇa yāvacchīlaskandho yāvatprajñāskandho yenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
SA01abhsubhu:2989: atṛpta evaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāmāśayo yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanā[yā]māśaya iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2990: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattva[sya] śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāmatṛptāśayo yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāvanāyām /
SA01abhsubhu:2991: yadbodhisattvastāṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāparaṃparāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāparaṃparamā bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanānna bhraṃśayati na vicchinattīti /
SA01abhsubhu:2992: ya evaṃrūpa āśāyo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ vipulāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2993: muditataraśca bodhisattvo bhavati tayā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā sattvānanugṛhṇan,
SA01abhsubhu:2994: na tveva te sattvā anugṛhyamāṇā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2995: ya evaṃrūpaāśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ muditāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2996: upakaratarāṃśca sa bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā upakarāti nātmānam,
SA01abhsubhu:2998: ya evarūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāmupakarāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2999: na ca bodhisattvastathā vipulamapi śīlapāramitāmayaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāmayaṃ puṇyamabhisaṃskṛtya tasya pratikāreṇa (Abhidh-s-bh 108)
SA01abhsubhu:3001: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3002: tatra yadbodhisattva evaṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāmayasya yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāmayasya puṇyaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:3004: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:3009: tatra kāyavibhutvaṃ tāthāgatau dvau kāyau draṣṭavyau svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogikaśca /
SA01abhsubhu:3010: tatra caryāvibhutvaṃ nairmāṇikaḥ kāyo draṣṭavyo yena sarvākārāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sahadhārmikacaryāṃ darśayati /
SA01abhsubhu:3030: pratyekaṃ dānādīnāṃ traivighyāt tribhistribhirupastambhairyathākramaṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3031: tatra trividhaṃ dānam - abhayadānaṃ dharmadānamāmiṣadānaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:3032: trividhaṃ śīlam - saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:3035: trividhaṃ vīryam - saṃnāhavīryaṃ prayogavīryaṃ sattvārthakriyāvīryaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:3036: trividhaṃ dhyānam - dṛṣṭadharmasukhāvihārāya dhyānamabhijñānirhārāya dhyānaṃ sattvārthakriyāyai ca dhyānam /
SA01abhsubhu:3037: trividhā prajñā - saṃvṛtyālaṃbanā paramārthālaṃbanā sattvārthālambanā ca //
SA01abhsubhu:3040: abhayadānaṃ cittopastambhaḥ daurmanasyaviśeṣā[pa]gamāya cetasa āśvāsāya saṃhārāt /
SA01abhsubhu:3044: kuśalamūlākṣayatā sarvasattveṣu kriyārthādhikāritayā yāvatsāraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe 'pi nirvāṇadhātāvaparityāgaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:3046: gaṇaparikarṣaṇaṃ karmaṃ adhigamaṃ niśritya vineyānāmasamāhitasya cittasya samādhānāya samāhitasya vā cittasya vimokṣāyāvavādānuśāsanopradānam,
SA01abhsubhu:3051: punaḥ prabhedaḥ sapta dānāmi - mūladānaṃ gotrāvasthasya bodhisattvasya dānapāramitā,
SA01abhsubhu:3059: vinā vāhyenopakaraṇaparigraheṇa gaganagañjādisamādhibhirākāśe pāṇiṃ saṃcārya yatheṣṭaṃ ratnādivarṣaṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:3073: tadanena viśiṣṭena cittotpādena pāramitānāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:3076: yatpunaḥ parānupakaraṇopasaṃhāreṇānugṛhṇātyayaṃ svārthaḥ evamavaśiṣṭābhiḥ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3086: ityevaṃ tathatāsamyajjñānasvabhāvataḥ paramārtho dānādibhiḥ saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3088: vipakṣo dānādīnāṃ yathākramaṃ mātsaryadauḥśīlye krodhakauśīdye vikṣepadauḥprajñe /
SA01abhsubhu:3089: api khalu yāvantaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pāramitābhiḥ saṃgṛhītāsteṣāṃ yo vipakṣo jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca sa tāsāṃ vipakṣo veditavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:3095: mahābhogatā sugatigamanamavarābhedasukhasaumanasya bahulatā sattvādhipapatyamavyābādhyātmabhāvatā maheśākhyatā ca yathākramaṃ dānādīnāṃ vipākaphalaṃ veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:3103: tatraiva yā maitracittasya paratravighātotpīḍāviheṭhasaṃvaraṇatā sā śīlapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:3105: tatraiva yā bhūyo bhūyaścittasyotsahanatā sā vīryapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:3106: tatraiva yā cittasyaikāgratā kuśalādbahiravisaraṇatā sā dhyānapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:3107: tatraiva yā yathāvaddhetu phalasugṛhītatā dṛṣṭyaparāmarṣaṇatā sā prajñāpāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:3108: evaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyamubhayadānaṃ sarvajñajñānamiti kṛtvā //
SA01abhsubhu:3111: tatra dānādīnāṃ svabhāvo yathākramaṃ visargaḥ saṃvaro marṣaṇābhyutsāhaścitasthitiḥ pravicayaśca /
SA01abhsubhu:3113: tatra dānādīnāmupayogaḥ samādāpanā varṇavāditā sumanojñatā ca /
SA01abhsubhu:3114: tatra dānādīnāṃ ropaṇā yā parasaṃtāne pratiṣṭhāpanā /
SA01abhsubhu:3122: syāddānapāramitā na śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitayāsaṃgṛhītā yā dānapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:3127: syāt pāramitā na dānaṃ śīlādayo mahābodhipariṇāmitāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3130: syānna dānaṃ na pāramitā uktavinirmuktā dharmāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3132: yo dānaṃ samācarati sarvo 'sau dānapāramitānvayaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatīti catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01abhsubhu:3138: viśeṣato vaipulye audāryagāmbhīryadeśanā tatphalasya sarvajñatvasya paramodāragambhīratvātphalānurūpyeṇa hetunirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:3139: ekatyānāṃ tadanadhimokṣe trāsaḥ bodhisattvagotravaikalyaṃ prakṛtyā hīnacittatayā gāmbhīryaudāryadeśanāṃ nādhimoktuṃ śaknuvanti /
SA01abhsubhu:3142: adhimucyamānānāmapyekatyānāmaniryāṇaṃ nītārtha sūtrama[na]nviṣya svayaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarṣasthāyitayā yathārutamarthābhiniveśāta /
SA01abhsubhu:3144: evamanye 'pi yathārutārthābhiniveśino mahāyāne na niryāntotiveditavyaṃ nānābhiprāyabhāṣitatvāt mahāyānasyeti /
SA01abhsubhu:3145: idaṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mahādharmādarśe dharmaparyāye - bodhisattvasya yathārutamayoniśo dharmān vicinvato 'ṣṭāviṃśatirasaddṛṣṭaya utpadyante //
SA01abhsubhu:3148_0: tatra nisvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā ityevamādikaṃ mahāyāne rutamupalabhya tadabhisaṃdhyakuśalāḥ
SA01abhsubhu:3148_1: yathārutamevāsyārthamadhimucyamānā abhāva evāyaṃ bhagavatā deśitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanutpāda
SA01abhsubhu:3149: ta evamabhāvādinimittamabhiniviśamānāstrīnsvabhāvānavadante parikalpitaṃ svabhāvaṃ paratantraṃ pariniṣpannaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:3150: tatrāyaṃ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo yadrūpamiti vā yāvannirvāṇāmiti vābhilāpaprajñaptimātrabhabhūto niḥśarīrārtho yadbālā rūpādilakṣaṇaṃ samāropattaḥ parikalpayanti /
SA01abhsubhu:3152: tatrāyaṃ pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvo yatsarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvaṃ (Abhidh-s-bh 113) tathatā /
SA01abhsubhu:3154: ta evaṃ sarvathā sarvadharmānapavadamānāstasyā apavādadṛṣṭeḥ pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ kāṃcideva yuktiṃ parigṛhṇanti,
SA01abhsubhu:3155: ye 'pi nītārthāḥ sūtrāntā nirabhilāpadharmatādyotakāstānapi sarvān svadṛṣṭayānulomyena pariṇāmayanti /
SA01abhsubhu:3156: te eva dve dṛṣṭo bhavataḥ parigrahadṛṣṭiḥ pariṇatidṛṣṭiśca /
SA01abhsubhu:3157: te punarevaṃdṛṣṭayo bhavanti - ya etāmīdṛśīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ niśritya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā samācarati sa niravadya eva bhavati nirdoṣaḥ sarvamevāsya tatkalyāṇatāṃ yāti,
SA01abhsubhu:3159: te caivaṃ svadṛṣṭāvabhiniviṣṭāstad dṛṣṭiviparyayeṇa skandhādidharmavyavasthāpakaṃ śrāvakapiṭakamavajānanti,
SA01abhsubhu:3161: te ete dve dṛṣṭī bhavato 'vajñādṛṣṭiḥ prakopadṛṣṭiśca /
SA01abhsubhu:3162: svadṛṣṭyanusāreṇa caite yathāvacchūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vyavasthāpayamānā atallakṣaṇe tallakṣaṇasaṃjñino viparītameṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpayanti,
SA01abhsubhu:3163: evaṃcittāśca bhavanti - yasyāmīdṛśyāṃ dharmatāyāmavatarantyavatārayanti vā sarve te 'prameyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavantītyevamete dṛṣṭī viparītadṛṣṭiḥ prasavadṛṣṭiśca /
SA01abhsubhu:3164: yadā punaste tāṃ dṛṣṭimārabhya paraṃranuyujyante tadā na kiṃcitsvayamicchantyabhyupagantum,
SA01abhsubhu:3167: te caivamabhimānino bhavanti - ya evaṃ pratipadyante [te] samyagbuddhān bhagavataḥ pūjayanti satkurvantītyeṣāṃ satkāradṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3168: aviparītadharmatākuśalaiśca tatā dṛṣṭervivecyamānāḥ sūpapannayā prasiddhayā yuktayā pratyāyamānā api tāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na kathaṃcit parityajanti,
SA01abhsubhu:3170: etāsāṃ ca yathānirdiṣṭānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ yadvāsanādauṣṭhulyaṃ sā mūladṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3171: eta eva ca saptadaśadṛṣṭayo doṣodbhāvanāmukhenāvaśiṣṭābhiḥ dṛṣṭibhiḥ punarnidiśyante /
SA01abhsubhu:3194: ata evānantaraṃ tatraiva sūtra uktamitīmāḥ saptadaśa samānāḥ daśa bhavanti,
SA01abhsubhu:3200: yena vā svabhāvenaite pūrvamabhūvanna tena svena bhāvena bhūyaḥ śakyamebhirbhavitumiti niḥsvabhāvāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3202: yādṛśo vādṛṣṭasatyairdharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo lakṣaṇamabhilāpaprapañcavāsanāmukhena gṛhyate tena bālagrāhānurūpeṇa svabhāvena vi[ra]hitatvānniḥ svabhāvāḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:3203: api khalu sarvadharmā ucyante trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3204: tatra parikalpitasya svalakṣaṇameva nāstyataḥ svalakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3205: paratantrasya svayamutpattirnāsti pratyayāpekṣaṇādato nāsya svena bhāvena bhāva ityutpattiniḥ svabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3206: pariniṣpanno viśuddhyālaṃbanatvāt paratantraparikalpitalakṣaṇābhāvasvabhāvatvācca paramārthaścaiṣa niḥsvabhāvatāprabhāvitaśceti paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3207: ityevaṃ ca kṛtvā niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā draṣṭavyāḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:3209: api khalu mahāyāne tathāgatasya sarve 'bhiprāyāḥ saṃkṣepeṇa catvāro bhavanti /
SA01abhsubhu:3210: tadyathā samatābhiprāyo yadāha - ahameva tasmin samaye vipaśyī (Abhidh-s-bh 115)
SA01abhsubhu:3213: kālāntarābhiprāyoyadāha - ye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau praṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti te tatropa patsyanta iti,
SA01abhsubhu:3214: vimalacandraprabhavasya ca nāmadheyagrahaṇamātreṇa niyato bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti,
SA01abhsubhu:3216: arthāntarābhiprāyo yadāha - niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā ityevamādi,
SA01abhsubhu:3218: pudgalāśayābhiprāyo yattadeva kuśalamūlaṃ kasyacitpraśaṃsanti kasyacidvigarha te 'lpamātrasaṃtuṣṭasya /
SA01abhsubhu:3221: kaukṛtyenāvṛtasya ye buddhabodhisattveṣvapakāramapi kariṣyanti te sarve svargopagā bhaviṣyantītyāha /
SA01abhsubhu:3223: ekaṃ ca yānaṃ na dvitīyamastīti deśayati śrāvakatvāśayatyājanārtham //
SA01abhsubhu:3234: kleśena ca susaṃkliṣṭā labhante bodhimuttamām // iti /
SA01abhsubhu:3236_0: vikṣepo hi visāraścetasaḥ viparyāse ca susthitāḥ iti nityasukhaśucyātmaviparyayeṇānityādike
SA01abhsubhu:3236_1: viparyāse ca susthitā aparihāṇitaḥ kleśena ca susaṃkliṣṭāḥ iti dīrghaduṣkara vyāyāmaśrameṇātyartha parikliṣṭāḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:3237: vaipulye dharmasamādhikuśalabodhisattvanirdeśaḥ śamathānuśaṃsaṃ vipaśyanānuśaṃsaṃ tadubhayānuśaṃsaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyaḥ /

SA01abhsubhu:4042: tadyathā buddhākṣepasūtre - catvāra ime bodhisattvānāṃ bodhipariśodhakā dharmāḥ - śūnyatābhāvanā,
SA01abhsubhu:4046: catuṣkaḥ svārtha paramārtha cārabhya bodhipariśodhanāya caturvipakṣapratipakṣeṇa veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4055: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ - prathamena jñānasaṃbhārastribhiḥ puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ paridīpitaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:4061: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ śūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti - adhyātmaṃ cittāvikaṃpanatayādhimuktipravicayabalādhānatayā,
SA01abhsubhu:4064: yadāśritya yathā ca bhāvayanti tadetena paridīpitam /
SA01abhsubhu:4069: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ sarvasattveṣvapratihatacittā bhavanti maitrībhāvanayā,
SA01abhsubhu:4073: atrāpi yadāśritya yathā cāpratihatacittā bhavanti tatparidīpitaṃ bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:4080: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā bodhisattvānāṃ nityaṃ hitamupasaṃharanti - ātmanaḥ paritulanatayā,
SA01abhsubhu:4089: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā nirāmiṣeṇa cittena dharmadānaṃ saṃprakāśayanti - antarāyasukhaprativedhatayā,
SA01abhsubhu:4103: prabhidyasaṃdarśana[vi]niścayo yathānirdiṣṭeṣu skandhādiṣu dharmeṣu yathāyogamekāvacārakādīni / tatra -
SA01abhsubhu:4104: ekāvacārako nāma praśno yenaikaṃ dharmaṃ pariśiṣṭaiḥ saha pratyekaṃ praśnayitvā tamapahāya dvitīyaṃ tenānyaiśca saha praśnayatyevamekaikasyaiva sarvān praśnayati /
SA01abhsubhu:4106: yo vā rūpāyatanena cakṣurāyatanenāpi sa iti pūrvapādakaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4107: yaścakṣurāyatanena samanvāgataḥ śrotrāyatanenāpi sa ityatra catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01abhsubhu:4108: evaṃ yāvanmanaāyatanenāpi sa ityatra yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:4111: yo vā cakṣurāyatanena rūpāyatanenāpi sa iti paścātpādakaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4112: yo rūpāyatanena samanvāgataḥ śrotrāyatanenāpi sa ityatra cāpi paścātpādakaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4114: yaḥ śrotrāyatanena samanvāgataścakṣurāyatanenāpi sa ityatra catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01abhsubhu:4117: pūrvapādakaṃ dvayordharmayoḥ kathaṃcideva dharmamārabhya parasparaṃ pṛṣṭayoḥ pūrvadharmamadhiṣṭhāya yadvayākriyate /
SA01abhsubhu:4118: tadyathā yajjñānaṃ jñeyamapi tadyadvā jñeyaṃ jñānamapi taditi /
SA01abhsubhu:4122: paścātpādakaṃ tathaiva dvayordharmayoḥ parasparaṃ pṛṣṭayoryatpaścimamadhiṣṭhāya vyākriyate /
SA01abhsubhu:4123: tadyathā yadgrāhyaṃ grāhakamapi tadyadvā grāhakaṃ grāhyamapi taditi /
SA01abhsubhu:4126: rūpādayaḥ pañca viṣayā dharmāyatanaṃ ca saṃprayuktakavarjyam //
SA01abhsubhu:4127: dvikoṭikaṃ yatra dve koṭī vyākriyete tadanyāsaṃbhavāt tadyathā skandhasya vyavasthānaṃ dhātuvyavasthānaṃ ca nigamayyocyate - yā skandhasaṃkhyā dhātusaṃkhyāpi sā,
SA01abhsubhu:4131: tathāhi naiko dhāturasti yaḥ sakalarūpaskandhalakṣaṇo vā syāt sakalavijñānaskandhalakṣaṇo vā /
SA01abhsubhu:4135: trikoṭikaṃ yatra tisra eva koṭayo vyākriyante /
SA01abhsubhu:4142: syāt skandhasaṃkhyāyatanasaṃkhyā ca vijñānaskandho manaāyatanaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:4146: yo vā śrotrendriyeṇa samanvāgataścakṣurindriyeṇāpi sa iti /
SA01abhsubhu:4151: oṃkāritaṃ yatra praśne vyākaraṇamomiti kriyate evametadityabhyupagamyata ityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4153: ye vā saṃskārāḥ sarve te 'nityā iti pṛṣṭena omiti vyākartavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:4155: tadyathā skandhavinirmuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ katibhiḥ satyaiḥ saṃgṛhītā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:4156: prātikṣepikam - na santi skandhavinirmuktāḥ saṃskārā iti //
SA01abhsubhu:4183: ete cānupalambhā yat kiṃcidatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ yāvadyadvā dūre yadvāntika ityetadanukramānusāreṇa draṣṭavyāḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:4186: yo nopalabhate yadyena yasmai yato yasya yatra nopalabhate yāvadvividhaścānupalambha iti //
SA01abhsubhu:4212: rājakulaṃ yatra rājā svayaṃ saṃnihitaḥ yuktakulaṃ yatra rājñādhiyuktāḥ sabhā vaṇik sabhādi /
SA01abhsubhu:4213: prāmāṇikāḥ sahāyakāḥ yeṣāṃ vacanaṃ vādiprativādinau na saṃśayataḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4214: dharmārthakuśalāśca śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye teṣu śāstreṣu granthataścārthataśca vyutpannabuddhayaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:4215: vādādhiṣṭhānaṃ yadadhiṣṭhāya vādaḥ kriyate tadyathā sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca //
SA01abhsubhu:4216: tatra svabhāvaḥ sādhya ātmasvabhāvo dharmasvabhāvaśca nāstīti vāstīti vā //
SA01abhsubhu:4217: viśeṣaḥ sādhya ātmaviśeṣo dharmaviśeṣaśca sarvagato na sarvagato nityānityo rūpyarūpītyevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:4219: sādhyagrahaṇaṃ yadi na kriyeta siddhasyāpi svapakṣasya pareṣāṃ deśanā pratijñā prasajyeta /
SA01abhsubhu:4220: svarucitārthagrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta parapakṣasyāpi sādhyasya vacanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
SA01abhsubhu:4221: paragrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta ekākino 'pi tadvacanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
SA01abhsubhu:4222: saṃprāpaṇagrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta kāyenāpi tadarthābhinayanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
SA01abhsubhu:4223: vijñāpanāgrahaṇaṃ na kriyetāvijñāte 'pi tadarthe śrotṛbhiḥ pratijñā prasajyeta /
SA01abhsubhu:4224: yathokte tu vyavasthāne sarva ete doṣā na bhavanti,
SA01abhsubhu:4228: tathāhi pratyakṣānupalaṃbhādupalaṃbhādvetyanena samākhyānena tasmin sādhye 'pratītasyārthasya saṃpratyaya utpadyate /
SA01abhsubhu:4230: pratyakṣopalaṃbhānupalaṃbhau punaḥ svabhāvaṃ liṅgaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyau //
SA01abhsubhu:4234: yathā sādhyo 'rthastribhiravayavaiḥ sādhitastathā śiṣṭānāmapi tajjātīyānāṃ sādhyānāṃ sādhitārthadharmopagamāya nayatvena samākhyānaṃ yuktyātideśa upanayaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:4241: sa hyātmā prajñapyamānaḥ skandhalakṣaṇo vā prajñapyeta,
SA01abhsubhu:4245: tadyadi skandhalakṣaṇastenāsvatantrāḥ skandhāḥ pratītyasamutpannā udagavyayadharmāṇastallakṣaṇa ātmānopapadyata iti doṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4246: atha skandheṣu tenānityaskandhāśrita ātmānityaḥ prāpnotīti doṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4247: athānyatra skandhebhyastena nirdehaka ātmā niṣprayojana iti doṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4248: athāskandhakastena prakṛtyaiva muktasya kevalino mokṣārthaprayatnavaiyarthyamiti doṣaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:4250: taddhayatītaṃ vidyamānalakṣaṇatvena prajñapyamānaṃ vartamānalakṣaṇaṃ vā prajñapyeta,
SA01abhsubhu:4251: vartamāne vā anyatra vā vartamānāt vartamānanirapekṣaṃ vā /
SA01abhsubhu:4253: atha vartamāne tenāniruddhe niruddhātmakasya saṃbandho na yujyata iti doṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4254: athānyatra vartamānāttena vartamānaṃ hitvā na kiṃcittadvastūpalabhyate yatra tatprajñapyata iti doṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4257: ato 'nena vartamānaprajñaptau caturdoṣeṇa siddhenāsiddha ātmā nāstīti skandhaprajñaptau caturvidhadoṣopalaṃbhāt prasādhyate nāstīti //
SA01abhsubhu:4258: evamātmaviparyāsaṃ pratiṣidhyaitayaiva yuktyā nityādayo 'pi na santītyatideśa upanayaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:4259: yasmādetadevaṃ tasmādanityāḥ pañca skandhāḥ yāvadanātmāna iti nigamanamiti //
SA01abhsubhu:4262: sadgrahaṇaṃ ghaṭādidravyāṇāṃ loke pratyakṣasaṃmatānāṃ pratyakṣatvavyudāsārtha prajñaptimātratvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:4267_0: pratyakṣādyadanyacchiṣṭamapratyakṣaṃ niyamena tatsahavarti prasiddhaṃ draṣṭuḥ pūrvaṃ
SA01abhsubhu:4267_1: tasya tatpratyakṣamīkṣamāṇasya tadanyasmin śiṣṭasaṃpratyaya utpadyate tenāpyatra
SA01abhsubhu:4270: yatropadeśe tatpratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca sarvathā na virudhyete na vyabhicarataḥ sa āptāgamaḥ saṃpratyayitvāt //
SA01abhsubhu:4271: vādālaṃkāro yena yukto vādī vādaṃ kurvāṇo 'tyarthaṃ śobhate /
SA01abhsubhu:4273: tatra svaparasamayajñatā svasiddhāntaṃ parasiddhāntaṃ cārabhya granthataścārthataśca paurvāparyeṇa nirantaraṃ vyutpattiparipākaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4280: tatra kathātyāgo 'sādhu mama sādhu tavetyevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ svaparavādadoṣaguṇābhyupagamaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4282: yathoktaṃ sūtre - āyuṣmāṃścundikastīrthikaiḥ saha vādaṃ kurvannavajānitvā pratijānāti pratijānitvāvajānātīti /
SA01abhsubhu:4298: (Abhidh-s-bh 154) asthiraṃ yatpratijñāyāvajñātamavajñāya pratijñātamatitvaramāṇayā vācā hi tūrṇaparāmṛṣṭaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4304: akaraṇena vā guṇadoṣau vicārya vādasya nigrahasthānānāsādanāt,
SA01abhsubhu:4310: tadyathā svaparasamayajñatā vāde bahukaro dharmo yena sarvatra kathāvastuni vādaṃ karoti /
SA01abhsubhu:4312: kuśalapakṣaprayuktenetyuktvā pratipattisārakeṇeti vacanamāśayaviśuddhijñāpanārthaṃ na lābhasatkārādinimittaṃ śrutādikuśalapakṣe prayuktenetyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4314: evaṃ ca svahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyata ityayameṣāṃ padānāmanusaṃdhirveditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4315: avigṛhyāpi tāvadvāde kriyamāṇe prakṛtigambhīratvānmahāyānadharmasya durlabhājñā prāgeva vigṛhya /
SA01abhsubhu:4316: yaiśca saha vigṛhya vādaḥ kriyate te 'pi pratipattāro nājñābhiprāyāḥ pratibruvanti kiṃtarhyupālambhābhiprāyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4317: yeṣvapi prāśnikeṣu sa vādaḥ kriyate te vāsabhyā avyutpannā vā bhavantyabhiniviṣṭā vā /
SA01abhsubhu:4318: sarvo 'pi ca vādā prāyeṇa ṣaḍbhirdoṣairyukto bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:4319: tathāhi vādaṃ kurvāṇaḥ kadācidatirabhasenāsatpakṣamapi parigṛhyābhiniveśena chalajātinigrahasthānānyapi prayukte /
SA01abhsubhu:4324: svayaṃ ca teṣu cittaṃ pradūṣayatītyebhiḥ ṣaḍbhirdoṣairyukto bhavati //
SA01abhsubhu:4327: sati cānupaśame durlabhaṃ paracittānurakṣaṇaṃ svacittānurakṣaṇaṃ ca yena pare prasādaṃ labheran vimuktyāyatanayogena svacittaṃ samādhīyate /
SA01abhsubhu:4328: prāyeṇa vāde kathamahaṃ jayeyaṃ pare parājīyerannityevaṃ cittaṃ samudācarati /
SA01abhsubhu:4332: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hatvā ityasyāṃ gāthāyāṃ loke yadatyarthamavadyaṃ pātakaṃ tadabhidhāyīnyakṣarāṇyetāni viśuddhau pariṇāmitāni /
SA01abhsubhu:4337: tatra pratiniyato gurujano mātā pitā ca,
SA01abhsubhu:4359: hīno loke caturvidhaḥ - manaskarmahīnaḥ kāyakarmahīno vākkarmahīna upabhogahīnaśca /
SA01abhsubhu:4367: upabhogahī naḥ śvā kā kaḥ preto vetyevamādikaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:4376: vāntāśo dṛṣṭe dharme upakaraṇabalena kāyaṃ saṃdhā rayato 'pi bhogajīvitāśābhāvāditi //
SA01abhsubhu:4379: śarīraṃ punarasyāḥ samādhiṃ niśritya bodhisattvā darśanabhāvanāmārgābhyāṃ mahābodhiṃ spṛśantīti //
SA01abhsubhu:4389: tatra parameṇa brahmacaryeṇa samanvāgata iti lokottareṇa mārgeṇetyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:4390: nānyatra maithunānmaithunasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣata iti tasyaiva yathābhūta parijñānena tatprahāṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:4396: maithunapratipakṣeṇa ca dharmeṇottrasyati tatpratipakṣeṇa mārgeṇa sarvasattvottaraṇāya vyavasyatīti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:4397_0: abhīkṣṇaṃ ca dvayadvayaṃ samāpadyate saṃkleśavyavada nadvayena phalahetubhedena catuḥsatyātmakena
SA01abhsubhu:4403: ityabhidharmasamuccaye bhāṣyataḥ sāṃkathyaviniścayo nāma pañcamaḥ samuccayaḥ samāptaḥ //
